short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Terrorists aspire to that title but they don't deserve it. This is how we take it away from them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Terrorists are cowards. That is what they should be called.

This chrome extension changes the word terrorist (and variations of) to coward on web pages.
